events.message: I recently purchased a jacket from your website but want to request a refund because it does not fit as expected.
The customer's request has been identified as a refund inquiry related to sizing and fit issues with the jacket.
Assigning a customer service specialist to handle the refund case for the jacket return request.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. Iâ€™m here to assist you with your jacket refund request.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm if the jacket has been worn or washed, so we can proceed with the refund?
My order number is 458392, and the jacket has not been worn or washed. I only tried it on once indoors.
Thank you for the information. We will authorize your refund upon receiving the returned jacket. I will send you a prepaid shipping label shortly.
That sounds great, thanks for the quick reply. I appreciate the prepaid label to make the return easier.
The return shipping label has been emailed to you. Once we receive the jacket, your refund will be processed within 3-5 business days.
Checking in to confirm if your jacket return was shipped and if you need any further assistance with the refund process.
Yes, I sent the jacket back yesterday via the prepaid label. Thank you again for your help.
Your refund has been processed and the case is now closed. Please let us know if you need assistance in the future.
